Actions.Text: AMEND (T) AND RECOMMIT TO WAYS AND MEANS

Title: Relates to exempting computer hardware and software and school supplies from sales tax during a specified period
Summary: Exempts computer hardware and software and school supplies from sales tax during the seven day period commencing on the Tuesday immediately preceding the first Monday in September, known as Labor Day, and ending on Labor Day.
ActClause: AN ACT to amend the tax law, in relation to exempting computer hardware and software and school supplies from sales and compensating use tax during two one-week periods each year
